description: This is a beautiful one bedroom apartment in the heart of Williamsburg. The apartment is convenient to lots of amazing restaurants, bars, and grocery stores and is a short (5 minute) walk to both the L and J,M trains. The large windows face south and west for great natural light all day. There is a roof deck with views of the Manhattan skyline, and wireless internet is provided.
name: Bright one bedroom with roof deck in Williamsburg
review: Appartament is very convenient located in Brooklyn close to subway and many options for a snack, lunch, drink or anything else you wish. The building is new, with a convenient laundry. Carey's space is well equiped. Kitchen is awesome, you can find everything you need for a (professional) meal
